00018 void initQUESTEnv(QUESTEnv *env){
00019         // init MPI environment
00020         int rank, numRanks, initialized;
00021         MPI_Initialized(&initialized);
00022         if (!initialized){
00023                 MPI_Init(NULL, NULL);
00024                 MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &numRanks);
00025                 MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
00026 
00027                 if (DEBUG) {
00028                         char hostName[256];
00029                         int hostNameLen;
00030                         MPI_Get_processor_name(hostName, &hostNameLen);
00031                         printf("rank %d on host %s\n", rank, hostName);
00032                 }
00033                 env->rank=rank;
00034                 env->numRanks=numRanks;
00035         } else printf("ERROR: Trying to initialize QUESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00036 }
00037 
00038 void syncQUESTEnv(QUESTEnv env){
00039         MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void closeQUESTEnv(QUESTEnv env){
00043         int finalized;
00044         MPI_Finalized(&finalized);
00045         if (!finalized) MPI_Finalize();
00046         else printf("ERROR: Trying to close QUESTEnv multiple times. Ignoring\n");
00047 }
00048 
00049 void reportQUESTEnv(QUESTEnv env){
00050         if (env.rank==0){
00051                 printf("EXECUTION ENVIRONMENT:\n"); 
00052                 printf("Running distributed (MPI) version\n");
00053                 printf("Number of ranks is %d\n", env.numRanks);
00054 # ifdef _OPENMP
00055                 printf("OpenMP enabled\n");
00056                 printf("Number of threads available is %d\n", omp_get_max_threads());
00057 # else
00058                 printf("OpenMP disabled\n");
00059 # endif 
00060         }
00061 }

00075 static int isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(int chunkId, int chunkSize, int measureQubit){
00076         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (measureQubit);
00077         int numChunksToSkip = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00078         // calculate probability by summing over numChunksToSkip, then skipping numChunksToSkip, etc
00079         int bitToCheck = chunkId & numChunksToSkip;
00080         return bitToCheck;
00081 }
00082 
00083 double calcTotalProbability(MultiQubit multiQubit){
00084         double pTotal=0; 
00085         double allRankTotals=0;
00086         long long int index;
00087         long long int numAmpsPerRank = multiQubit.numAmps;
00088         for (index=0; index<numAmpsPerRank; index++){ 
00089                 pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index];      
00090                 pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index];      
00091         } 
00092         if (DEBUG) printf("before calc prob. %d\n", multiQubit.numChunks);
00093         if (multiQubit.numChunks>1) MPI_Allreduce(&pTotal, &allRankTotals, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00094         else allRankTotals=pTotal;
00095 
00096         return allRankTotals;
00097 }
00098 
00108 static int chunkIsUpper(int chunkId, int chunkSize, int rotQubit)
00109 {       
00110         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (rotQubit);
00111         long long int sizeBlock = sizeHalfBlock*2;
00112         long long int posInBlock = (chunkId*chunkSize) % sizeBlock;
00113         return posInBlock<sizeHalfBlock;
00114 }
00115 
00129 static void getRotAngle(int chunkIsUpper, Complex *rot1, Complex *rot2, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00130 {
00131         if (chunkIsUpper){
00132                 *rot1=alpha;
00133                 rot2->real=-beta.real;
00134                 rot2->imag=-beta.imag;
00135         } else {
00136                 *rot1=beta;
00137                 *rot2=alpha;
00138         }
00139 }
00150 static int getChunkPairId(int chunkIsUpper, int chunkId, int chunkSize, int rotQubit)
00151 {
00152         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (rotQubit);
00153         int chunksPerHalfBlock = sizeHalfBlock/chunkSize;
00154         if (chunkIsUpper){
00155                 return chunkId + chunksPerHalfBlock;
00156         } else {
00157                 return chunkId - chunksPerHalfBlock;
00158         }
00159 }
00160 
00169 static int halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(int chunkSize, int rotQubit)
00170 {
00171         long long int sizeHalfBlock = 1LL << (rotQubit);
00172         if (chunkSize > sizeHalfBlock) return 1;
00173         else return 0;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void rotateQubit(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int rotQubit, Complex alpha, Complex beta)
00177 
00178 {
00179         // flag to require memory exchange. 1: an entire block fits on one rank, 0: at most half a block fits on one rank
00180         int useLocalDataOnly = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, rotQubit);
00181         Complex rot1, rot2;
00182 
00183         // rank's chunk is in upper half of block 
00184         int rankIsUpper;
00185         int pairRank; // rank of corresponding chunk
00186 
00187         // MPI send/receive vars
00188         int TAG=100;
00189         MPI_Status status;
00190 
00191         if (useLocalDataOnly){
00192                 // all values required to update state vector lie in this rank
00193                 rotateQubitLocal(multiQubit, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00194         } else {
00195                 // need to get corresponding chunk of state vector from other rank
00196                 rankIsUpper = chunkIsUpper(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, rotQubit);
00197                 getRotAngle(rankIsUpper, &rot1, &rot2, alpha, beta);
00198                 pairRank = getChunkPairId(rankIsUpper, multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, rotQubit);
00199                 //printf("%d rank has pair rank: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, pairRank);
00200                 // get corresponding values from my pair
00201                 MPI_Sendrecv(multiQubit.stateVec.real, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00202                                  multiQubit.pairStateVec.real, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00203                                  MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00204                 //printf("rank: %d err: %d\n", multiQubit.rank, err);
00205                 MPI_Sendrecv(multiQubit.stateVec.imag, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00206                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec.imag, multiQubit.numAmps, MPI_DOUBLE, pairRank, TAG,
00207                                 MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00208                 // this rank's values are either in the upper of lower half of the block. send values to rotateQubitDistributed
00209                 // in the correct order
00210                 if (rankIsUpper){
00211                         rotateQubitDistributed(multiQubit,rotQubit,rot1,rot2,
00212                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //upper
00213                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //lower
00214                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00215                 } else {
00216                         rotateQubitDistributed(multiQubit,rotQubit,rot1,rot2,
00217                                 multiQubit.pairStateVec, //upper
00218                                 multiQubit.stateVec, //lower
00219                                 multiQubit.stateVec); //output
00220                 }
00221         }
00222 }
00223 
00224 double findProbabilityOfZero(MultiQubit multiQubit,
00225                 const int measureQubit)
00226 {
00227         double stateProb=0, totalStateProb=0;
00228         int skipValuesWithinRank = halfMatrixBlockFitsInChunk(multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit);
00229         if (skipValuesWithinRank) {
00230                 stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00231         } else {
00232                 if (!isChunkToSkipInFindPZero(multiQubit.chunkId, multiQubit.numAmps, measureQubit)){
00233                         stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroDistributed(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00234                 } else stateProb = 0;
00235         }
00236         MPI_Allreduce(&stateProb, &totalStateProb, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00237         return totalStateProb;
00238 }
